data.text: with "Gilmore Girls," I was at the gym.

data.text: This girl stops -- she stops me.

data.text: She goes, "Excuse me. Do you play Jess on 'Gilmore Girls'?"

translation.text: Cô ấy nói, "Xin lỗi. Bạn có chơi Jess trên 'Gilmore Girls' không?"

data.text: I go, "Yeah, actually I do."

data.text: -Yeah. So, what we're doing this season,

translation.text: -Yeah. Vì vậy, những gì chúng ta đang làm trong mùa này,

data.text: Jack goes back to Vietnam,

title: Milo Ventimiglia Teases Vietnam and Jack-Rebecca First Dates for This Is Us Season 3
